algorithms.compGeometry.clustering.twopointcorrelation

Class RandomClusterAndBackgroundGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.compGeometry.clustering.twopointcorrelation.RandomClusterAndBackgroundGenerator

  • public class RandomClusterAndBackgroundGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    utility class for unit tests which need to create random background points and points in clusters.
    Author:
    nichole

      • createRandomPointsAroundCenterWithDSquared

        protected void createRandomPointsAroundCenterWithDSquared(java.security.SecureRandom sr,
                                              float maxRadius,
                                              int numberOfPoints,
                                              float xc0,
                                              float yc0,
                                              float[] x0,
                                              float[] y0,
                                              int xyStartOffset)
        create a group of points around a center whose density distribution decreases by distance squared from the center. the points are randomly chosen to populate that distribution.
        Parameters:
        sr - - instance of secure random to use
        maxRadius - - maximum radius of group of points
        numberOfPoints - - number of points in the group
        xc0 - - x coordinate of the group center to create
        yc0 - - y coordinate of the group center to create
        x0 - - the output array to hold results for the x coordinates of the group
        y0 - - the output array to hold results for the y coordinates of the group
        xyStartOffset - the offset in the arrays x0 and y0 indexes with which to start adding points.
